text: Midwestern Baptist Theological Seminary (MBTS) is one of six official seminaries of the Southern Baptist Convention. It is in Kansas City, Missouri. It contains the full Spurgeon library. == References == == Other websites == * Official Midwestern Baptist Theological Seminary website Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Missouri Category:Southern Baptist Convention Category:Charles Spurgeon Category:Seminaries
title: Midwestern Baptist Theological Seminary
